description: This file defines a React functional component named Navbar, which implements a sticky, accessible navigation bar with anchor links, a primary call-to-action, and a mobile menu toggle. It includes internal state management and event handling to close the menu on hash changes.

methods.name: Navbar
methods.description: React functional component implementing a sticky navigation bar with toggle menu

methods.name: LinkItem
methods.description: A subcomponent that renders an anchor link with styling
